titles: An ansvver to the articles preferd against Edvvard Finch, vicar of Christ church by some of the parishioners of the same whereunto is added a just and modest reply to a most scurrilous, scandalous and malicious pamphlet, as by the title may appeare, of an uncertaine author / by Edvvard Finch...
author: Finch, Edward, d. 1642?
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Christ Church (Newgate, London, England). --  Petition and articles or severall charges exhibited in Parliament against Edward Finch, vicar at Christs Church in London.
